message.content: {"id": "14943", "title": "Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends", "description": "When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code on a Windows machine contains LF as linefeeds instead of the correct line endings for the platform.", "OB": "Steps to reproduce: 1. Use code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable. 2. Observe that the resulting code contains LF as linefeeds on a Windows machine.", "EB": "N/A", "SR": "Expected behavior: When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code should have the correct line endings for the platform."}
